organisation_name: European Network on Religion and Belief (ENORB)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
ENORB is an ABSL (Association Sans But Lucratif) registered in May 2012 with the Moniteur Belge,  Chaussée d'Anvers 53 1000 Bruxelles. 
ENORB is a member of ENAR (European Network against Racism, Rue de Gallait 60, 1030, Bruxelles
relevant_communication:
Joint projects with other EU Equality Bodies - ENAR, ILGA-Europe, EWL. 
Seminars, campaigns 
Seminars on Religion, Belief and LGBT rights. 
Workshops on Religion, Belief and Freedom of Speech. 
Seminars September on Religious dress and symbols in the context of EU fundamental rights 
Seminar on Gender and Religion/Belief
